comment.author: 26495331@N04
comment._content: Obviously not a monitor with a protruding walking beam...

comment.author: 45832120@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/26495331@N04]  I think you are right.  When looking at other Navy images in this set this appears to be taken from the same ship and location as this: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/usnationalarchives/4152990717/]. If you search for: "Hunchback" you will find several examples in this set that feature the same structure.  The USS Hunchback is listed as a side-wheel steamer, not the USS Monitor, or any of the Monitor class ships, it was actually a ferry boat before the war and served as one after the war.  Hopefully this can get corrected.
